De esta manera ve la necesidad de invertir para mejorar sus ingresos y ganancias por lo que está solicitando un préstamo de Q 5,500.00 para comprar pilones (plantas pequeñas) de lechuga y abono orgánico para luego cultivarlo. 
Entre sus sueños está construir un invernadero para su cultivo, mediante las ganancias que obtiene en lo que realiza.
texts.en:
Jorge is a 29-year-old single man.  He lives with his 4 children, 2 boys and 2 girls in Colonia Chuatraz in zone 2 of the Barrio el Calvario Sololá in Sololá.  He makes a living in agriculture, cultivating lettuce near his home.  He learned this work with his father when he was little.  He has been doing this kind of activity for 8 years now since this type of crop maintains its price on the market and he has better earnings with which he covers all of the family expenses.

In this fashion he sees the need to invest in order to improve his revenue and profit and therefore he is requesting a loan of 5,500.00 quetzales (GTQ) to buy small lettuce plants and organic fertilizer to then cultivate the plants.

Among his dreams is to build a greenhouse for his crop by means of the profit that he obtains from what he is doing.

loans.use: to buy small lettuce plants and organic fertilizer.

loans.name: Eufrocina

texts.en:
This is Eufrocina. Her previous loan was a big help with her business. It was also a big help with her children's education as well as their household expenditures. As of now, she is more focused on selling fruits and vegetables. She and her husband both work hard to provide for their everyday needs.

She would like to apply for another 15,000 PHP loan for her to purchase more fruits and vegetables needed for her business. Her profits from the business will definitely help her to sustain her daily needs and the educational expenses of her children. She looks forward to this financial increase with gladness and thankfulness in her heart.

Eufrocina hopes that her business will continue to grow and that all of her products will be sold. She dreams that her children will finish their studies. She meets up with her co-fellowship members every week to share stories of her life and business and also to draw strength and inspiration from the Word of God, which she studies.

* All CCT community partners / clients are organized into fellowship groups that meet on a weekly basis. A fellowship group is composed of 15 to 30 community partners. The fellowship groups gather each week to study the Word of God, build social capital, and pay microfinance loans.

loans.use: to pay for more fruits and vegetables needed for her business.

loans.name: Erdenebat

texts.en: Erdnebat is 55 years old and lives with his wife in an apartment in the Selenge province of Mongolia. His 3 children are all married and live on their own. His wife Selenge stays home taking care of her husband and helps him to run his business. He has been running an auto spare parts retail business in a rental stall at the local market. He has already built close relationships with his suppliers and customers. He is now requesting 3,700,000 MNT to purchase a large amount of spare parts to sell to his customers. He is an experienced, responsible, well-organized person.

loans.use: to purchase a large amount of spare parts to sell to his customers.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase a reception counter and chair, computer and programs, treatment bed, therapeutic chair, magnetic board for lectures and other office and publicity materials.

loans.name: Lutfiniso

texts.ru: Лутфинисо пожилая жизнерадостная  женщина  в возрасте 55 лет. Она замужем  и имеет четверо замечательных детей. Все вместе они живут в одном большом доме. Дети понемногу помогают своим родителям. Но Лутфиниссо с детства привыкла зарабатывать деньги себе на нужды. И даже сейчас, когда она уже не такая и молодая она реализует свой бизнес. Этот бизнес приносит ей постоянный доход, что помогает ей удовлетворять все свои потребности. Лутфинисо занимается продажей бытовых товаров. Этот бизнес она ведёт уже более 20 лет. Она закупает на оптовом рынке различные товары для быта и привозит их для продажи в свой посёлок. Для этого у неё имеется небольшой магазин. Также в этом деле ей помогает муж. Хотя раньше он работал в местном дехканстве, но сейчас решил только помогать своей жене в расширении её бизнеса. Этот бизнес приносит хороший доход, и если увеличить ассортимент товара, то прибыли будет тоже больше. Поэтому Лутфинисо хочет закупить больше товара и расширить свой бизнес. Она обратилась в Арванд, чтобы получить кредит на покупку различного бытового товара для расширения своего бизнеса. Она заранее благодарит Арванд за поддержку.
texts.en: Lutfiniso is an older woman, 55 years old. She is married and has four wonderful children. They all live together in a large house. The children help their parents some. Lutfiniso has since childhood always worked to earn the money she needs. Even now, no longer a young woman, she is running her own business. The business is bringing her a steady income, which helps meet her needs. Lutfiniso sells consumer goods, as she has been for over 20 years. She buys various goods at a wholesale market and brings them to sell in her village. She has a small store there to sell the goods. Her husband also helps with the business. He used to work on a farm, but has decided to focus solely on helping his wife expand her business. The business brings them a good income, and if they expand their inventory, they can do even better. That is why Lutfiniso wants to buy more goods and expand the business. She came to Arvand for a loan to buy various consumer goods to grow the business. She thanks you ahead of time for the support.

loans.use: to buy consumer goods

loans.name: Saidmurod

texts.ru:
Саидмуроду 48 лет, живет он в районе Дж.Руми. У него большая семья. Он женат и отец пятерых детей. Саидмурод как глава семьи хочет создать хорошее условие проживания для своей семьи и дать образование своим детям. Для этого он собирается заняться прибыльным бизнесом - овцеводством. 
Овцеводство как отрасль слабо зависит от колебаний рынка, ведь шерсть как продукт всегда востребована у потребителей. Так же высоко ценится овечий сыр, который считается диетическим продуктом, он не жирный и содержит много полезных веществ. А мясо молодого ягненка считается изысканным деликатесом, многие рестораны считают блюдо, приготовленное из такого мяса, своим коронным. Первое увеличение потомства овца может дать уже в возрасте 8-9 месяцев, а вес молодняк набирает достаточно быстро. 
Саидмурод имеет хорошее место для содержания и разведения овец. Он планирует закупать по 4 голов овец и после одного месяца их откорма продавать на местном рынке с хорошей наценкой. Для реализации цели Саидмурод обратился за кредитом. На сумму кредита он хочет приобрести четырех овец и их корм и приступить к деятельности.
texts.en: Saidmurod is 48 years old, and lives in the J. Rumy district. He has a large family: he is married and has five children. Saidmurod, as the head of the family, wants to provide good living conditions for the family and provide his children with an education. To do this he is planning to start an income generating business - sheep husbandry. Sheep breeding is only weakly impacted by market swings because wool is always needed by consumers. Sheep cheese is also highly valued, as it is considered very healthy since it is not fatty and has many nutrients. Additionally lamb meat is considered a choice delicacy, and many restaurants showcase their lamb dishes. The first offspring of a ewe can be sold at 8-9 months, and the lamb gains weight fairly quickly. Saidmurod has a good place for keeping and breeding sheep. He plans to buy four, and after a month of feeding them, sell them at the local market for a profit. To reach that goal, Saidmurod is asking for a loan. He hopes to use the loan to buy four sheep and their feed, and get his business started.

loans.use: Buy four sheep and their feed to start a sheep breeding business.

loans.name: Sadafmo

texts.ru: Садафмо женщина с доброй душой. Ее родители всегда гордились ею и мечтали о том, как их дочь будет счастливой. Однако реальная жизнь была для Садафмо такова, что она развелась с мужем и осталась матерью одиночкой 3 детей. Дети еще маленькие. Им 10, 8  и 1,5 года. Она должна зарабатывать деньги и кормить своих детей. Она более 5 лет занимается купле продажей детской одежды. Садафмо хорошо знает тонкости своего бизнеса и имеет опыт в сфере бизнеса. С бизнесом она справляется сама. Садафмо хочет развевать бизнес и получить больше дохода. Она запрашивает займ на сумму 1500 долларов США для покупки детской одежды для нового сезона. Она ждет вашу доброту и верит на вашу благотворительность. Это займ поможет улучшить условию проживания 3 не совершеннолетних детей, которых бросил их отец.
texts.en: Sadafmo is a woman with a good heart. Her parents have always been proud of her, and dreamed that their daughter would be happy. But in reality Sadafmo's life has made her a single mother of three, since she and her husband were divorced. The children are still young: 10, 8, and 1.5 years old. She needs to earn money to feed the children. For over five years she has been selling children's clothing. She knows all the ins and outs of the business and has business experience. She runs it all herself. She would like to expand the business and earn a better income. She is asking for $1500 USD loan for buy children's clothing for the new season. She awaits your kindness and believes in your charitableness. The loan will help her improve the lives of her three young children, abandoned by their father.

loans.use: To buy children's clothes for new season

loans.name: Shahlo

texts.ru: Шахло 39 лет. Она трудолюбивая и честная женщина. Шахло разведена и воспитывает своих 2 сыновей сама. Шахло живет бедно, так как бывший муж не помогает обеспечить детей. Она единственная надежда и кормилица своих детей. Шахло более 1 года работает в кафе, который находится в культурном парке ее района. Она получает маленькую зарплату и ей очень трудно справляться с расходами семьи. Она должна отремонтировать крышу своего дома, так как в сезон дождя течет с крыши дома. Она запрашивает займ на сумму 1000 сомони для покупки шифера и других строительных материалов для ремонта крыши дома. Она ждет вашу доброту.
texts.en: Shahlo is 39 years old. She is a hardworking and honest woman. Shahlo is divorced and is raising her two sons herself. Shahlo is poor, since her former husband is not helping support the children. She is the only one who provides for and feeds them. Shahlo has worked in a cafe in her district's city park for over a year. She receives a small income and it is very hard to cover her family's expenses. She needs to repair her house's roof, since in the rainy season the roof leaks. She is asking for a 1000 somoni loan to buy roofing slate and other building materials to repair the roof. She awaits your kindness.

loans.use: To buy slate for repairing the roof of her house

loans.name: Melodie

texts.en: Melodie is single and lives in Malaubang, Ozamiz City. She was studying in Misamis University here in Ozamiz City. The income of her parents is good enough for the basic needs of the family. This semester her parents was unable to support all her school needs because her younger brother needs support also. But despite the hindrances, she was able to find ways in order to continue her journey. In order to finance the tuition fees, she borrowed an amount of 12,000 PHP from GDMPC where she had joined recently. She hopes to finish her studies to have a better future.

loans.use: to finance her tuition fees.

loans.name: Zana

texts.en:
Zana is a 39-year-old mother of four from Israel’s Negev region. For the past three years she has managed a mobile jewelry store selling pieces in the city and a nearby village. After studying her competition and speaking to existing and potential customers, Zana decided it was time to open a shop. She has rented a place at the entrance to a major neighborhood which is easily accessible.

Zana needs this loan to assist in purchasing shelving and closets, rings, watches, and earrings, and to help with payment of renovations.

Zana wants to see her shop develop and one day expand to include additional items wanted by women. She wants to see herself become an economically strong, independent woman.

loans.use: to purchase shelving and closets, rings, watches, and earrings, and to help with payment of renovations.

loans.name: Isabel

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal “IMA SUMAC SUNCCO”; El banco está ubicado en la  provincia de Cusco y departamento de Cusco.
	
La socia es la Sra. Isabel; la socia continua dedicándose a la compra y venta de verduras, la socia continua vendiendo en uno de los mercados de la ciudad del Cusco, la socia es una persona responsable y empeñosa, la socia desea poder seguir trabajando para de esta forma seguir apoyando a su familia.
La socia solicita el préstamo para la compra de cebollas al por mayor.
La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota
texts.en: The member belongs to the "IMA SUMAC SUNCCO" community bank, which is located in the province and department of Cusco. This member is named Isabel. She continues to work in the purchase and sale of vegetables. She continues to sell them in one of the markets in the city of Cusco. She is a responsible and diligent  person. She wishes to be able to continue working so that in this way she can continue to support her family. The member is seeking the loan in order to buy onions in bulk. She is happy about her loan and promises to meet her instalment payments.

loans.use: to buy onions in bulk

loans.name: Las Palmita Group

texts.es: Este grupo está formado por cuatro socios emprendedores una de ellas es Carmen mujer soltera con 61 años de edad,  con tres hijos mayores que le ayudan en la administración de su negocio, desde hace 25 años se dedica a comercializar mercadería en general como ropa, zapatos, cosméticos, etc. ambulantes y al crédito en su comunidad y a empleados de empresas publica y privadas, este crédito lo invertirá en la compra de cosméticos como perfumen, champo, tintes para pelos, lociones de varón, ropa como pantalón de varón, pantalón de dama, camisas de varón, camisetas, chores, vestiditos de niñas, zapato de damas, zapatos de varón, etc. Juan Antonio es un varón que tiene 32 años su negocio es ser mecánico, Marcia tiene 29 años su negocio es la venta de cosméticos de la Avon y Mónica tiene 19 años de edad y su negocio es la venta de ropa nueva.
texts.en:
This group has 4 dedicated members. Carmen, a single woman age 65, has three grown children who help her manage her business. For 25 years she has sold general merchandise like clothing, shoes, cosmetics, etc, door-to-door and on credit in her community and to the employees of public and private businesses. 

She will use this loan to buy cosmetics like perfume, shampoo, hair dye, men's lotion, and clothing like pants, shirts, t-shirts, shorts and shoes for men and women, and dresses for girls, etc. 

Juan Antonia, 32, is a mechanic. Marcia, 29, sells Avon cosmetics. Monica, 19, sells new clothing.

loans.use: to buy cosmetics like perfume, shampoo, hair dye, and men's lotion, as well as clothing like pants, shirts, t-shirts, shorts and shoes for men and women, and girls' dresses.

loans.name: Olga Lucía

texts.es: Olga Lucía es una mujer de 34 años de edad, madre de 2 hijos y actualmente es separada. Hace aproximadamente un año compró un negocio que estaba mal administrado y era poco visitado, pero ella con su esfuerzo y dedicación lo transformó, dándole una nueva cara y haciéndolo más agradable para los clientes que la visitan. El negocio es una cafetería donde ofrece variedad de productos como mecato, refrescos, jugos, café, helados, entre otros. Es una mujer emprendedora y dedicada, lucha constantemente para sacar a sus dos hijos adelante y generar ingresos para sostener las necesidades en su hogar. Con el crédito que solicita en la Corporación desea comprar surtido (mecato, gaseosas, sándwiches preparados, confitería) para ofrecer otras alternativas a sus clientes y así aumentar las ventas y generar más utilidades, además sería un aporte para brindar una excelente educación a sus hijos. Su meta es hacer crecer su negocio, que sea reconocido y perdurable en el tiempo y, de esta forma conseguir una estabilidad económica para ofrecerle a su familia una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Olga Lucía is a 34-year-old woman and the mother of two children. She is currently separated from her spouse. Approximately one year ago, she bought a business that was badly managed and had few customers. Through her effort and dedication, she transformed the business by giving it a new appearance and making it more pleasant for the customers who visit. Her business is a cafeteria where she offers a variety of products such as pastries, soft drinks, juices, coffee, ice cream, and other items.

Olga is an enterprising and dedicated woman who strives to help her two children get ahead by generating income to satisfy the needs of her household. The loan she is requesting from Interactuar will be used to buy inventory (pastries, sodas, prepared sandwiches, and candy) so that she can offer other alternatives to her customers, increase her sales, and generate more profit. As a result, she will be able to provide an excellent education for her children.

Her goal is to grow her business so that it becomes well-known and stable over time. This will enable her to provide financial security and a better quality of life for her family.

loans.use: to buy inventory such as pastries, sodas, prepared sandwiches, and candy.

loans.name: Virgen Del Rosario Group

texts.es:
Virgen del Rosario es un trabajador grupo de Ciudad del Este,  está en su Sexto Ciclo del programa de comités, están haciendo la encuesta de eliminación de pobreza, donde tres de las señoras se encuentran por debajo de la línea de pobreza, con ingresos muy escasos.
Una de las integrantes es la Sra. Jorgelina, quien por medio de la venta de calzados que hace está teniendo mejoras en su vida, todo esto gracias a que siempre tiene buenos productos y les gusta a sus clientes. Está contenta por formar parte del grupo de mujeres, ya que De esa forma puede seguir ayudando a su familia por medio de su trabajo.
Solicita de este crédito para poder invertirlo en la compra de calzados de diferentes tipos, como ser calzados deportivos, botas, zapatillas, sandalias y demás, y de esa forma tener siempre una buena variedad que ofrecer a sus cliente.
texts.en:
“Virgen del Rosario” is a working group from Ciudad del Este. This is its sixth loan cycle with the committee program. The members have taken a poverty elimination survey and the results indicated that three of these women are below the poverty line and have very scant incomes.

One of the members is Sra. Jorgelina. By selling shoes, she has been able to make improvements in her life. All of this has been possible because she always offers good products and her customers like her. Jorgelina is pleased to be part of this group of women. As a result of her work, she has been able to help her family.

Jorgelina is requesting a loan so that she can invest in the purchase of shoes of all types, such as sports shoes, boots, slippers, sandals, and other items. This will help her to always provide a good variety to her customers.

loans.use: to buy sports shoes, boots, slippers, sandals, and other items.

loans.name: Erlinda

texts.en:
This is Erlinda. Her previous loan was a big help in her business. She was able to buy all the ingredients and products needed for her business. The loan also helped in the education of her children as well as in the daily expenses of her family. She and her husband are working hard to provide for their everyday needs.

She would like to apply for another 25,000 PHP loan for her to purchase raw ingredients like rice, pork, chicken, vegetables and products needed in her business. Her profits from the business will definitely help her to sustain her daily needs and the educational expenses of her children. She looks forward to this financial increase with gladness and thankfulness in her heart. 

Erlinda hopes to have a restaurant someday and dreams to have their house renovated. She meets up with her co-fellowship members to share stories of her work every week, where she can also draw strength and inspiration from the word of God that they study.

* All CCT community partners / clients are organized into fellowship groups that meet on a weekly basis. A fellowship group is composed of 15 to 30 community partners. The fellowship groups gather each week to study the word of God, build social capital, and pay microfinance loans.

loans.use: to pay for raw ingredients like rice, pork, chicken, vegetables and products needed in her business.

loans.name: Deisy Tamara

texts.es:
Deisy, requiere optar por un nuevo préstamo porque necesita invertir en su negocio para brindarles un mejor servicio a los clientes; este le permitirá comprar estantes, balcones, mostrador.
El efecto que tuvo del crédito anterior fue favorable, ya que le ayudo a mejorar las ventas en su tienda y así obtuvo mayores ingresos económicos y con ello logro mejorar su vivienda, eso hizo optimizar la calidad de vida de su familia.
texts.en:
Deisy is requesting a new loan because she needs to invest in her business so that she can provide better service to her customers. The money will allow her to buy shelving, braces, and a display counter.

The effect of her previous loan was favorable since it helped her to improve the sales in her store and generate more income. As a result, she was able to make improvements to her home and optimize her family’s quality of life.

loans.use: to buy shelving, braces, and a display counter.

loans.name: Altantsetseg

texts.en: Altantsetseg is 45 years old and lives with her husband and two children in their house in the Selenge province of Mongolia. Her husband Bayarhuu is starting his own farming business. Her older son helps his parents and her younger son studies at the local school. Altantsetseg started her butcher shop business in a rental stall of the local market in 1994. She has regular customers and suppliers in the countryside. She is now requesting loan of 1,700,000 MNT to purchase livestock from herders to let her husband start his business of farming. Altantsetseg, Bayarhuu and their sons are a hardworking, open-minded and happy family.

loans.use: to purchase livestock from herders to let her husband to start his business of farming

loans.name: Leonor

texts.es:
La socia Leonor se dedica al negocio de venta de verduras,la socia vende zapallos,zanahorias,tomates entre otros,la socia ya tiene en este negocio 8 años y le va muy bien,la socia trabaja en el mercado vendiendo verduras desde las 8:00 a.m hasta las 7:00 p.m,el sueño de la socia es ampliar el negocio de verduras.La socia solicita el credito para comprar zanahorias,cebollas y zapallos.

La socia esta contenta con el credito ys e compromete a cumplir los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
Leonor has a business of selling vegetables such as squash, carrots, tomatoes, and other items. She has been in business for eight years and is doing very well. Leonor works at the market by selling vegetables from 8:00 A.M. to 7:00 P.M. Her dream is to expand her vegetable business.

Leonor is requesting a loan in order to buy carrots, onions, and squash. She is pleased with the loan and promises to complete her payments.

loans.use: to buy carrots, onions, and squash.

loans.name: Rebecca

texts.en:
This is Rebecca. She has previously accessed an 8,000 PHP loan that she used to purchase merchandise items and products needed in her business. Her earnings were a big help in her personal, household and business expenditures.

She would like to apply for another 10,000 PHP for her to buy more merchandise items and products to increase her product inventory. The more items displayed at the store the better. More items to sell will result in more profit. Her profits from business will definitely help her to sustain her daily needs. She looks forward to this financial increase with gladness and thankfulness in her heart.

Rebecca dreams to have more customers and hopes for good health. She meets up with her co-fellowship* members every week to share stories of her life and business, and also to draw strength and inspiration from the fellowship and the word of God, which she studies.

* All CCT community partners / clients are organized into fellowship groups that meet on a weekly basis. A fellowship group is composed of 15 to 30 community partners. The fellowship groups gather each week to study the word of God, build social capital, and pay microfinance loans.

loans.use: to pay for additional supplies and merchandise such as clothing, footwear, undergarments and cosmetics needed in her business.

loans.name: Jocelyn

texts.en:
Jocelyn is married. She has three children. She is 36 years old and she lives in Nailon, Tudela, Misamis Occidental. 
Her business is successful, and she has recently taken a new loan to purchase sugar, spices and noddles for sale.
In the future she hopes to improve and expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase sugar, spices and noddles for sale

loans.name: Charita

texts.en: Charita, 42, is married with two children and lives in Canibungan Daku, Clarin, Misamis Occidental, Philippines. Charita owns and operates a plot of farm land, planting coconuts and corn to earn a living. She requests a loan of 12,500 PHP from GDMPC to purchase fertilizer such as manure and to finance the farm weeding costs. In the future, she hopes to improve the general living conditions of her family.

loans.use: to purchase fertilizer such as manure and to finance the farm weeding costs.

loans.name: Prudencia

texts.en:
Prudencia is 58 years old and is from Panta-on, Ozamis City, Misamis Occidental. She is married and blessed with two children. 

Prudencia is working as baker to help the family to earn a living. She has been in this business for years and earns about 5,000 PHP per month.

She also has a farm for planting and harvesting corn and root crops for sale. She has requested a loan in the amount of 5000.00 PHP to buy fertilizer.

Prudencia plans that the income generated from her loan will be invested back into the business and enable her to pay the balance amount of her motorcycle, which will be used for services and her business as well.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer.

loans.name: Rosario

texts.en:
Rosario works hard to support her family. She is married and has a salted seafood business in the Philippines.

Rosario requested a PHP 10,000 loan through NWTF in order to buy ingredients for her salted seafood.

She has been in this business for 25 years.

In the future, Rosario would like to save enough to build a house for her family.

loans.use: to buy ingredients for her salted seafood

loans.name: Myagmar

texts.en: Myagmar is 49 years old and lives with his wife and two sons in a Ger, in the Uvs province of Mongolia. His wife Nyamsuren is unemployed. His older son Otgonhuu is 20 and works at a local company, and his younger son is enrolling in university this year. He has been providing a transportation service business in town since 2001 with his big truck. He transports construction materials by order and has regular clients. He is now requesting loan of 4,000,000 MNT to pay for his younger son’s tuition fees and to replace his truck's wheels. He is a hardworking, honest and modest man.

loans.use: to pay his younger son's tuition fees and replace his truck's wheels.

loans.name: Eda

texts.en:
Eda works hard to support her family. She is married and has a business in the Philippines buying and selling dried fish.

Eda requested a PHP 16,000 loan through NWTF to buy additional dried fish to sell.

Eda has been in this business for nine years now.

In the future, Eda would like to save enough money so she could send her children to school.

loans.use: to buy additional dried fish to sell

loans.name: Rosita

texts.en: Rosita, 54 years old, is married to a farmer and they blessed with three children. She was engaged in a retail store for almost 10 years, however unfortunately she stopped her retail store due to lack of capital. But now she wants to take a loan amounting to Php 10,000 to start her retail store again and to purchase grocery items to sell. She is hoping that her requested loan will be granted so that she can purchase all her needs for her retail store.

loans.use: To start her retail store again and to purchase grocery items to sell.

loans.name: Jocelyn

texts.en:
Jocelyn is a 42-year-old married woman. She is living in Nailon, Tudela, Philippines, where her wide array of rice production is located. She has been cultivating this land since she was 33 years of age until the present time. She doesn't mind the scratches and itches brought by this kind of plant, for as long as she can earn income Jocelyn goes for it. 

In 2011, Jocelyn joined GDMPC. She is requesting a new loan of 8,000 PHP to finance the costs of land preparation for rice production. She plans to use the generated revenue for the improvement and expansion of her farm.

loans.use: to finance the costs of land preparation for rice production.

loans.name: Nenita

texts.en:
Nenita is 50 years old and widowed with six children.

Nenita works hard to provide for her family. She runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 17,000 loan through NWTF to buy items to sell like sugar, milk, canned goods, noodles, spices, etc.

Nenita has borrowed and paid 16 loans from NWTF before this loan. She has been running the general store for 35 years and also earns an income from buying and selling charcoal and farming vegetables.

Nenita aspires to save enough money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy items to sell like sugar, milk, canned goods, noodles, spices, etc.

loans.name: Ahmad

texts.en: Ahmad is a 33-year-old married father of one child. He owns a small barber shop where he is in charge of haircuts. His wife is currently unemployed, which means that his shop is the only financial resource for the family. Because of his low income, Ahmad cannot seem to provide a healthy life for his family, especially now that his wife is pregnant. With a newborn on the way, he started transporting his neighbor students from /to school as an additional income business, to make sure most of his family’s needs are done. In fact, Ahmad contacted Al Majmoua in order to acquire a loan that would financially support him to provide for the best possible preparations for his child-to-be, it will be invested in paying for his wife's hospital expenses and baby delivery expenses (clothes and many other requested baby needs). As for the future, Ahmad wishes to purchase his own space to settle his shop Instead of paying the monthly rent.

loans.use: to pay for his wife's hospital expenses and baby delivery expenses

loans.name: Mohammad

texts.en:
Mohammad is 54 years old and is from Tulkrem. He is married. He owns a small plot of land where he has been planting vegetables such as cucumbers and tomatoes since 2003.

Mohammad asked Ryada for this loan in order to buy cucumbers and tomatoes seedlings to plant. He hopes that this loan will help him increase his productivity and improve his income.

loans.use: to buy cucumbers and tomatoes seedlings to plant

loans.name: Nano Group

texts.en:
Nano is a group composed of three Lebanese friends who live in a village in Mount Lebanon. They decided to join hands and support each other financially by acquiring a group loan from Al Majmoua. 

Sahar is the leader and featured member of the group. She is a 29 year-old married mother of three children, standing on the right of the picture. She owns a small shop where she sells accessories and toys for kids. Her husband is a sales employer. Her children are enrolled in a public school in order to provide them with an education she did not have the opportunity to complete. She decided to acquire the group loan in order to purchase merchandise for her shop and launch it.

As for the other group members, Adma is the woman standing at the center of the picture, while Safaa is the woman standing on the left of the picture.

loans.use: to purchase merchandise for her shop

loans.name: Emileta

texts.en:
As a married mother of three children, Emileta works hard to support her family.

She has a rice retailing business in the Philippines, and also earns additional income from a general store. Emileta is borrowing PHP 29000 through NWTF in order to purchase more rice to sell in her rice retailing business.

Emileta has been sustaining her business activities through her past 25 loans from NWTF. She hopes that her hard work will help her attain her dream to save enough to build a house for her family.

loans.use: to purchase more rice to sell.

loans.name: Concepcion

texts.en:
Concepcion is a hardworking entrepreneur who has a business in the Philippines buying and selling smoked fish. 

She is borrowing PHP 10,000 through NWTF to buy additional smoked fish to sell for her business buying and selling smoked fish. 

Concepcion has been in this business for 20 years. She earns more income from selling fish.

Concepcion has been sustaining her business activities through her own efforts with the help of the loans from NWTF. She dreams of saving enough money so she could send her children to school in the future.

loans.use: to buy additional smoked fish to sell

loans.name: Rosie

texts.en: Rosie, 47 years of age, is married to a farmer and they are blessed with two children. She's been engaged in the hog raising business for almost 20 years. In this business she's earning a net income of PHP 2,000 per hog. She's asking for a loan amounting to PHP 10,000 to purchase hog feed to sustain the needs of her hogs. She also wants to improve her pig pens for the better shelter of her hogs. She's hoping that her requested loan will be granted so that her hog raising business will become more profitable.

loans.use: To purchase hog feed to sustain the needs of her hogs

loans.name: Gloria

texts.es: Gloria tiene 31, está casada y vive en su casa propia junto su esposo y su hijo. Gloria se dedica a la venta de productos comestibles como arroz, azúcar, pan, leche entre otros. Su tienda está instalada en la parte delantera de su casa. Lleva ya 3 años con este negocio, cuenta con la ayuda de su esposo y su hijo con quienes se siente feliz de poder compartir un negocio que los beneficia a todos. Le gusta su trabajo pues le permite disponer de su tiempo para realizar otras actividades del hogar, este negocio le genera buenas ganancias ya que siempre hay clientes, tiene muchas ganas de seguir superándose y expandir su negocio hasta convertirse en una gran empresaria en la región. En esta oportunidad solicitará S/. 1800, está muy contenta de saber que tendrá un apoyo financiero, ya que así se sentirá segunda de avanzar con su negocio. Por otro lado se compromete una vez más a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas de manera puntual. Con el monto solicitado comprará mayor cantidad de productos comestibles arroz, azúcar, panes, huevos, leche y otros.
texts.en:
Gloria, 31, is married and lives in her own home with her husband and son.  She sells food such as rice, sugar, bread, milk, etc. out of the store she has set up in the front part of her house.  For three years she has been in business with the help of her husband and son; and she is happy to be able to share with them a business that benefits them all.  She likes her work because it allows her to schedule her own time and do other things at home.  Business generates a good profit because of the frequent customers.  

Gloria is very determined to get ahead and expand her business enough to become a great business owner in her area.  On this occasion, she is requesting 1,800 PEN and is happy knowing she will receive this financial support which will insure she can advance in her business.  She is committed to paying the loan back on time and will use it to buy more food such as rice, sugar, bread, eggs, milk, etc.

loans.use: To buy food such as rice and sugar for her business.

loans.name: Felicita

texts.es: Felicita tiene 43 años, está casada y vive en su casa propia junto su esposo y sus 4 hijos. Felicita prepare diversos platos de la región como “juanes” y arroz chaufa. Tiene su establecimiento en su propia casa en donde empieza a atender en la tarde. Sus ventas son muy buenas y sus ganancias económicas siempre son rentables y satisfactorias. Tiene este negocio desde hace 3 años, trabaja con la ayuda de su esposo. A pesar que le va muy bien siente que no es suficiente, por eso complementa su negocio diario vendiendo gaseosas y cervezas, ahora desea mejorar la infraestructura de su modesto restaurante y continuar en el camino al progreso. En esta oportunidad solicitará S/. 2000, por ello agradece la oportunidad que le brindan para que pueda concretar sus planes laborales. Con el monto solicitado comprará arroz, huevos, aceites, verduras y otros ingredientes que usa en la preparación de los alimentos que pone a la venta.
texts.en:
Felicita, 43, is married and lives in her own home with her husband and four children.  She makes diverse regional dishes such as "juanes" and fried rice and sells food in the afternoons at the stand she has set up at home.  Her sales volume is high and business is profitable and satisfactory.  For three years she has been in business with the help of her husband.

Despite the fact that things are going well she feels it is not enough and wants to begin selling soda and beer.  She also wants to improve the infrastructure of her modest restaurant and continue prospering.  

On this occasion she is requesting 2,000 PEN and is thankful for the opportunity to go ahead with her work project.  She will use the loan to buy rice, eggs, oils, vegetables and other ingredients used to prepare the food she sells.

loans.use: To buy rice, eggs, oils and other products for her food business.

loans.name: Julia

texts.es:
Julia tiene 51 años, está casada con Máximo de 55 años y tiene 4 hijos los cuales se encuentran estudiando gracias al apoyo que le brinda, vive en una casa hecha de  madera construido hace ya muchos años en un terreno que es de su propiedad. Julia se dedica a las actividades de cultivo  y producción, ella vio en el cacao una mejor manera de generar ingresos y sacar adelante a su familia , con sus ya casi 16 años de experiencia en este rubro siempre pudo contar con el apoyo incondicional de su esposo , aunque en ocasiones contrata a trabajadores del lugar para realizar el trabajo pesado. A puertas de empezar la temporada de mantenimiento es muy necesario contar con  abono orgánico para sus sembríos. Este es su segundo préstamo con Kiva y se siente agradecida por el apoyo financiero que recibe para seguir adelante, además se compromete a pagar sus cuotas de manera puntual.
En está oportunidad desea contar con 3,000 nuevos soles para comprar abono orgánico y continuar sembrando sin problemas.
texts.en:
Julia, 51, is married to Máximo, 55, and they have four children who are able to go to school.  They live in a wood house built several years ago on their own property.  For nearly 16 years Julia has been growing cocoa which she thought would be the best way to generate an income and provide for her family.  She has always been able to count on her husband for his unconditional support, although sometimes she must hire workers to do the heavy work.

With the crop maintenance season approaching, it is necessary to have organic fertilizer for the crops.  This is Julia's second loan through Kiva and she is grateful for the financial support to help her get ahead.  She is committed to paying back the loan on time.  On this occasion she is requesting 3,000 PEN to buy organic fertilizer and continue growing her crops without problems.

loans.use: To buy organic fertilizer.

loans.name: Patricia

texts.es:
Patricia tiene 27 años, está casada y vive en su propia casa junta su esposo y sus 2 hijos. Patricia se dedica a la venta de frutas y refrescos, para eso cuenta con una mesa que instala todos los días por las mañanas en el frente de su hogar, donde a sus clientes que. Se inició hace más de 2 años con un capital propio y hasta el momento cuenta con el apoyo de su hermana en la atención. Empezó a desarrollar esta labor cuando vio la necesidad de contar con un ingreso económico para apoyar a su esposo con los gastos de su hogar.
Por tanto, desea continuar y mantener su negocio hasta lograr establecer una tienda en su casa en donde pueda exhibir con mayor amplitud todo lo que tiene para vender. En esta oportunidad solicitará S/. 1800, está muy contenta por el apoyo financiero que le brindan para que pueda seguir adelante con su trabajo. Se compromete a cumplir con el pago puntual de  todas sus cuotas. Con el monto solicitado comprará frutas frescas, cítricos, plátanos y otros productos que necesita para seguir trabajando.
texts.en:
Patricia, 27, is married and lives in her own house with her husband and their two children.  She sells fruit and soft drinks from a table she sets up every morning outside her house.  She started the business over two years ago with her own money when she noticed the need to earn an income to help her husband cover household expenses.  Her sister helps out with the attention to customers.

She wants to continue with the business and eventually set up a store at home where she can display the products she has to sell.  On this occasion she is requesting 1,800 PEN and is happy about receiving financial support in order to continue her work.  She is committed to paying back the loan on time.  The loan will be used to buy fresh fruit, such as citrus fruit and bananas, and other products she needs to continue working.

loans.use: To buy fresh fruit such as bananas, and soft drinks.

loans.name: Agbemikoede

texts.fr: Manquant de fonds pour satisfaire ses clients, madame Agbemikoede sollicite l’aide de WAGES pour acheter des condiments et de la viande de bœuf. Elle est restauratrice avec une ancienneté de 05ans dans l’activité. Madame voudrait a l’avenir, avoir une boutique pour mieux répondre aux besoins des clients et assurer un lendemain meilleur à sa famille. Âgée de 32ans, elle est mariée et mère de 04 enfants dont 03 scolarisés. L’ainé est âgé de 12ans et le dernier 02ans.
texts.en:
Lacking funds to meet customer demand, Mrs. Agbemikoede is seeking support from Kiva's partner, WAGES, in order to buy food condiments and beef.

She's a restaurateur with five years of seniority. In the future, she would like to open a shop to better meet customers' needs and ensure better tomorrows  for her family.

She's 32 years old, married, and the mother of four children, out of whom three attend school. The eldest is 12 years old, the youngest is two.

loans.use: to buy food condiments and beef

loans.name: Irene

texts.es: Irene tiene 51 años, está casada y vive en su casa propia junto a su esposo y su hija. Irene se dedica a la fabricación de puertas, ventanas, escaleras y otros accesorios de estructura metálica. Tiene un taller de trabajo que ha constituido en su vivienda. Se inició en este negocio porque su esposo necesitaba un obrero que le ayude a realizar con mayor rapidez los trabajos. Comenta que este rubro le brinda muchas ganancias económicas ya que la zona en la que vive requiere de piezas inmobiliarias. Le va muy bien ya que su clientela se va incrementando con el paso del tiempo y eso le permite generar tranquilamente los ingresos económicos que necesita. Espera implementar su taller de trabajo con todas las herramientas que necesita y consolidar una mejor infraestructura de su espacio laboral. En esta oportunidad solicitará S/. 1000, por tanto agradece a todas las personas que hacen posible su acceso al préstamo que necesita para cumplir con sus objetivos laborales. Con el monto solicitado comprará algunos materiales como fierro y planchas de aluminio que necesita para su trabajo de cerrajería.
texts.en:
Irene, 51, is married and lives in her own home with her husband and daughter.  She runs a metal carpentry business and makes doors, windows, stairs and other accessories.  Her workshop is set up at home; and she started the business because her husband needed a worker to help get jobs done more quickly.  She claims this business sector is profitable because more housing is needed in the area.

Things are going well for Irene and her customer base has increased over time which means she is able to make the income she needs.  She wants to have on hand all the tools she needs to consolidate the infrastructure of her work space.  On this occasion she is requesting 1,000 PEN and is thankful to the people who make this loan possible so she can reach her goals.  She will use the loan to buy materials such as iron and aluminum sheeting for her work.

loans.use: To buy iron and aluminum sheeting for her business.

loans.name: Tuamuke Group

texts.fr: La cliente Gertrude est conseillère du groupe d’affaire « Tuamuke», entrepreneur expérimentée, âgée de 46 ans, mariée et mère de 9 enfants qui étudient tous. Son conjoint est un chauffeur. La cliente est vendeuse d’huile de palme,  farine de manioc, braises, etc. Elle installe ses différents articles à son domicile. Elle commença ses affaires avec  son fonds propre reçu de son mari, Il y a environ 5 ans. Ce nouveau prêt va lui servir d’acheter 2 bidons d’huile de palme, 1 sac de farine de manioc, 2 sacs de braises, etc. Ainsi, elle souhaite accroitre son entreprise, scolariser et nourrir ses enfants. Au finish, elle remercie fortement Hekima pour son soutien en microcrédit aux petits entrepreneurs.
texts.en:
Mrs. Gertrude, age 46, is the advisor of Tuamuke Group. She's an experienced entrepreneur, married, and the mother of nine children who all attend school. Her husband is a driver.

She sells palm oil, tapioca, charcoal, etc. She displays her products at her home. She started her business with her own funds, that she received from her husband approximately five years ago.

This new loan will enable her to buy two cans of palm oil, one sack of tapioca, and two sacks of charcoal, etc. With it, she wishes to expand her business, ensure her children's education, and feed them.

In conclusion, she thanks Hekima very much for supporting small-scale entrepreneurs with microcredit.

loans.use: to buy two cans of palm oil, one sack of tapioca, and two sacks of charcoal

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to buy one bale of jeans and bags from the market

loans.name: María Elena

texts.es:
María  es una mujer  de 23  años de edad, vive  junto a sus 3 hijos hombres en el Caserío La Cumbre, Concepción, Sololá.
Ella  se dedica a la elaboración de artículos como fajas, pulseras de mostacia y bordados a mano de diferentes clases, que son utilizados en  su comunidad. Esta labor lo realiza desde su vivienda. Aprendió esta actividad desde pequeña y lleva ya 10 años de trabajar con este tipo de artículos que le genere ingresos y ganancias buenas para solventar los gastos familiares. 
De manera que está solicitando un préstamo de Q 3,000.00 para comprar hilo y mostacia para la elaboración de su producto. 
Su mayor sueño es construir otra casa para sus hijos ya que están aun pequeños, esto lo quiere hacer con el fin de asegurarles una vida mejor en un futuro.
texts.en:
María is 23 years old and lives with her three sons in the small village of La Cumbre, in the Concepción municipality of Sololá.

María works from home and has a business producing hand crafted items such as belts, ceramic beaded bracelets and a variety of embroidery, which are used in her community. She learned her trade when she was very young and now has 10 years of experience with these types of crafts, which generates a good revenue and income to cover her family's expenses.

She is applying for this loan of 3,000 GTQ to purchase beads and thread which she needs to produce her products.
Her dream is to build another house for her children because they are still small, and she wants to achieve this to secure a better life for them in the future.

loans.use: to purchase beads and thread to produce her products

loans.name: Sans Doute Group

texts.fr:
Mr KADRE représente le groupe  SANS DOUTE. Marié, Il est père de 02enfants. Le plus âgé a 10ans et le moins âgé a 06ans.01 va à l’école et il a 05 personnes en charge.
Mr est réparateur de poste téléviseur depuis 1993 soit 20ans. Il s’approvisionne en ville. Ses clients sont les habitants de la ville.
Mr veut s’acheter quelques articles France au revoir pour réparer des téléviseurs.
Avec ses bénéfices, il veut s’occuper de sa famille. Mr ambitionne agrandir son atelier et assurer le bien être de la famille.
texts.en:
Kadre represents the Sans Doute group. Married, he is a father of two children, aged ten and six. One of his children go to school. He has five [additional] people in his care. 

Kadre has been a TV repairman for 20 years, since 1993. He procures his supplies in town. His customers are townspeople. 

Kadre wants to buy some parts from France to repair televisions. With his earnings, he wants to take care of his family.

Kadre aims to expand his workshop and ensure the well-being of his family.

loans.use: to buy some parts to repair televisions

loans.name: José Willian

texts.es:
José tiene 23 años de edad, es soltero. Solamente vive con el papá, un hermano y una prima los cuales desde que tiene uso de razón siempre han trabajado la tierra, se dedica a la agricultura ya hace mas de 12 años actividad que realiza con una gran experiencia, además de ser una persona de buenos valores y de una personalidad muy responsable con los compromisos que obtiene, en la comunidad es muy conocido.

Él compra los materiales en la ciudad, por lo cual tiene que desplazarse más de 35 kilómetros, distancia que recorre en el transporte colectivo de la comunidad; un transporte que pasa por la comunidad 4 veces durante la trayectoria del día muchas veces estos autobuses no salen y cuesta mucho movilizarse hacia la ciudad. 

El préstamo que esta solicitando a Fundación Campo, es para comprar abono, pesticidas, herbicidas, pago de mano de obra  por la limpia de los terrenos y el alquiler de los mismos; para cultivar 14,000 metros cuadrados de maíz y 7,000 metros cuadrados de frijol. 

Una de las primeras necesidades en satisfacer, es la obtención de ingresos a la familia después de la venta de ambas cosechas, además de asegurar la alimentación y sustento de la familia la cual prácticamente solo depende de esta actividad.  A parte de brindar trabajo a los miembros de la misma familia; ya que es una actividad productiva que los une como familia, también mejorara la calidad de vida y una mayor obtención de ingresos. 

Su propósito es,  construir un mejor hogar, terminar de construir la parte de atrás de la casa ya que hay una pequeña pared que esta averiada. Además, desea mejorar el nivel de educación; ya que planea estudiar por que el solamente estudio hasta noveno grado por lo cual piensa sacar el programa “BACHILLERATO A DISTANCIA”, el cual asistiría solamente los días sábado.
texts.en:
José is 23 years old and single. He lives with his father, a brother and a cousin, all of whom have always worked the land. José also works in agriculture and now has 12 years of experience. He says he has good values, is very responsible with the commitments he takes on, and that he is well known in the community.

José will buy the materials in the city, for which he has to travel 22 miles in the community’s public transit. The public transit goes by his community four times per day, but many times the buses do not come and it costs a lot to get to the city.

José is requesting a loan from the field partner to buy fertilizer, pesticides and herbicides, to rent fields to grow 3.5 acres of corn and 1.7 acres of beans, and to pay for the labor to clean the fields.

José will use the income from selling the two harvests to provide food for and support his family, who depend almost entirely on these harvests. In addition to providing work for the members of his family, José says that the cultivation of the fields together – as a collective productive activity – brings his family closer together. It also improves their quality of life and increases their income.

José would like to build a better home. He would like to finish the construction of the back part of his house, where there is wall that is damaged. He would also like to improve his education level, because he has only completed ninth grade. He is thinking of doing a “high school diploma by distance” program, which he would go to on Saturdays.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer, pesticides and herbicides, to rent fields to grow 3.5 acres of corn and 1.7 acres of beans, and to pay for the labor to clean the fields.

loans.name: Ofeliya

texts.en:
Ofeliya is 35 years old, married and mother of two kids.  She is an IDP (internally displaced person) and lives with her husband and  children in the Bilasuvar   IDP Settlement.  Her husband is a worker but   he doesn’t get a good salary, and because of that she is raising cattle and selling them for meat. This is the only financial income for their family. 

For that reason, Ofeliya is trying to expand her business together with her husband without any difficulty. She is very kind, caring and also very energetic in her work.  Ofeliya raises cattle, fattens them and sells them for a profitable price. 

She sells meat at the central bazaar for a profit. In Azerbaijan, there is a high demand for meat, because it is used in a lot of meals, such as kufta (soup), kababs, dolma, etc. Her income from this business is 180 AZN per month. In order to fully support the family, Ofeliya is looking forward to expanding the business and making it a very successful business. 

She has, for a second time, applied for a loan of 1900 AZN with Aqroinvest, to buy four calves. Ofeliya, at this very young age and with a great passion and energy, plans to become a successful businesswoman in the town.

loans.use: to buy four calves

loans.name: Nemat

texts.en:
Nemat is 30 years old and married with a five-year-old daughter. He is an internally displaced person (IDP) from Fizuli town. Now Nemat lives in the Fizuli region with his family. His wife stays at home, so he is the only one in the family earning an income. Nemat works as a farmer and has also opened a cafe. He wants his daughter to become a pianist.

Nemat is requesting a 2,300 AZN loan to buy a fridge for the cafe he opened a year ago. This will be his second loan. He wants to use the money for the future of his family. In the future, Nemat wants to expand and have more employees. He is thankful to Komak and Kiva for supporting him again.

loans.use: to buy a fridge for his cafe

loans.name: Khuderbat

texts.en:
Khuderbat, 36 years old, lives with his wife and son in Ulaanbaatar, the capital city of Mongolia. His son goes to kindergarten.

He and his wife have been making and selling shoes to local vendors at the outdoor market for 16 years and they have accumulated vast amounts of experience.  

During this period of the year, demand for shoes increases drastically and orders from clients are enough but he doesn't have enough materials for making shoes. So he is requesting a loan of 4,000,000 MNT to purchase leather, cotton, silk and laces. As a result, he and his wife can continue to make shoes without worrying about materials shortages. 

The borrower is a very hardworking individual who wants his son to be well educated in the future.

loans.use: to purchase raw materials in large volume.

loans.name: Shahin

texts.en:
Shahin is 31 years old, married and father of 3 children. His wife is a teacher.  Shain   started his business seven years ago in household  products  and sales. He is working whole day and his profit from this business is 120 azn.His  wife also helping him because it’s only one finance income to his family.

Now Shain   needs a loan of 1900 AZN to repair his store, to buy new furniture and to paint it .This will be more profitable for his business. Shain   is thankful to Aqroinvest   and Kiva for supporting him.

loans.use: to repair his store, to buy new furniture and to paint it

loans.name: Davaajargal

texts.en:
Mrs. Davaajargal, 35 years old, lives with her husband and four children in Ulaanbaatar, the capital city of Mongolia. Recently, her mother-in-law came to live with them as she became too old to take care of herself. She and her husband have been running a house decoration business for ten years and secured a lot of permanent clients. Up until now, they haven't posted any advertisement regarding their business and only because of the high quality service they provide their business is doing well. 

She is requesting a loan of 6,000,000 MNT (Mongolian tugriks) to purchase building materials such as planks, bricks, metals and cement in order to make an extension to her house. By doing this, the extension will stop heat loss through the walls, windows and roof. Stopping the loss of heat will enable the family to burn less coal for heating, which has a positive impact on efforts against air pollution. The borrower is a very hardworking woman who deeply cares for her family.

loans.use: to purchase building materials such as bricks, planks, metals and cement.

loans.name: Dora Mercedes

texts.es: Dora es una microempresaria exitosa su negocio es de una pulpería y librería en su domicilio desde hace 15 años, tiene 32 años de edad, casada y con un hijo menor de 6 años, su esposo y ella administran el negocio este crédito lo quieren invertir en la compra de productos de librerías como cuadernos universitarios, borradores, lapiceros, lápiz de grafitos, resistol, hojas fomy, cartulina, papel boom, papel de regalo, papel crepe, lápiz de colores etc.
texts.en:
Dora is a successful micro-entrepreneur. Her business is a grocery and stationary shop that she has operated out of her home for the past 15 years. She is 32 years old, is married and has a 6-year-old child. She and her husband run the business together. 

They want to invest this loan in the purchase of stationary products such as notebooks, erasers, mechanical pencils, graphite pencils, glue, loose-leaf paper, cardboard, bond paper, gift wrap, crepe paper, colored pencils, etc.

loans.use: to buy notebooks, erasers, mechanical pencils, graphite pencils, glue, loose-leaf paper, cardboard, bond paper, gift wrap, crepe paper, colored pencils, etc.

loans.name: Lluvia De Bendiciones Group

texts.es: Grupo formado por cuatro socias empresarias una de ella es Blanca mujer de 45 años, casada con dos hijos mayores de 22, 20 años de edad. Su negocio es de una pulpería desde hace mas de 5  años, sus hijos le ayudan en el negocio, este crédito lo invertirá en la compra de productos tales como arroz, frijoles, azúcar, aceite, sal, papel higiénico, carne de res, carne de pollo, productos lácteos, medicamentos populares, chiverías, gaseosas variadas, pan simple,  pan dulce, además comprara una paca de ropa usada, Tatiana tiene 23 años su negocio es la venta de cosméticos Avon, ropa nueva, Miriam tiene 53 años de edad y su negocio es la venta de prendas de plata y Darling tiene 28 años de edad y su negocio es la venta de repuestos de motos.
texts.en:
This group is made up of four enterprising members, one of whom is 45-year-old Blanca, who is married with two grown-up children of 22 and 20.  She has been running her grocery shop for more than 5 years with the help of her children.  She will use the loan to buy grains such as rice, beans, sugar, oil, salt, toilet paper, beef, chicken, dairy products, popular pharmaceutical products, snacks, various soft drinks, ordinary bread and sweet bread, as well as bales of used clothing.  

Tatiana, who is 23, sells Avon cosmetics and new clothing, Miriam, who is 53, sells silver jewellery and 28-year-old Darling sells motorcycle parts.

loans.use: to buy grains such as rice, beans, sugar, oil, salt, toilet paper, beef, chicken, dairy products, popular pharmaceutical products, snacks, various soft drinks, ordinary bread, sweet bread and bales of used clothing.

loans.name: Seyran

texts.en:
Seyran lives with his wife and three sons in the Syunik region. This region is famous for its severe cold climate and locals here are mostly involved in cattle breeding. Seyran breeds cattle and earns his living by running a farm where he keeps chickens, pigs, piglets, and cows. By selling agricultural products at the local markets, Seyran earns an income which is vital for sustaining his family. His two elder sons serve in the army and his little one, who is 11 years old, helps his father with cattle breeding.

Seyran is requesting a loan to purchase two cows. He is sure that his loan will help him to gather more income and continue his cattle breeding business successfully. Seyran waits for your support!

loans.use: to buy two cows

loans.name: Maruja

texts.es: Maruja tiene 30 años, es una mujer soltera que aún no tiene hijos y vive junto a su hermana en su casa construida a base de adobe. Maruja se dedica a la agricultura en los terrenos agrícolas que adquirió siendo muy joven, en donde siembra netamente cafe. Lleva ya casi 7 años en el rubro y siembre tuvo el apoyo de sus padres aunque en ocasiones contrata trabajadores del lugar para que realizen las actividades mas complejas. Le agrada su trabajo en el campo ya que esto le permite tener muy buenos ingresos económicos y seguir saliendo adelante. Antes del inicio de la temporada lluviosa en la zona desea contar con capital de trabajo para la adquisición de plantas y así mantener en buen estado sus terrenos de cultivo. Este es su primer préstamo con Kiva y se siente agradecida por el apoyo financiero que recibe para mejorar su actividad laboral, además se compromete a pagar sus cuotas de manera puntual. En está ocasión desea contar con 3,000 nuevos soles para la compra de un pequeño terreno agrícola en donde sembrará más plantas de café.
texts.en:
Maruja is a 30-year-old single woman who does not have any children and lives with her sister in an adobe house. Maruja's business focus is agriculture in farmland that she acquired when she was very young, where she only grows coffee. She has been working as a farmer for almost seven years and has always had her parents' support, although sometimes she contracts local workers to carry out more complicated tasks. She likes to work in the fields since it allows her to have very good economic profits and continue on. 

Before the rainy season begins, she would like to be able to have the capital necessary to acquire plants and maintain her farmland in good condition. This is her first Kiva loan, and she appreciates the financial support that she receives in order to improve her work activity. In addition, she is committed to paying her monthly payments on time. This time, she would like to be able to acquire 3000 nuevos soles ($1100) in order to buy a small piece of farmland where she will plant more coffee plants.

loans.use: to buy farmland.

loans.name: Gonzalo

texts.es: El Sr. Gonzalo tiene 37 años, casado y tiene cinco hijos de las edades de 16, 14, 12, 10 y 8 años que se encuentran en edad escolar,  se dedica a la actividad de la pesca  el vive en una isla del lago Titicaca, centro turístico del departamento de La Paz donde ofrecen al público  artesanías  de totoras y en lana, la mayoría de los habitantes de esta isla se dedican a la pesca y el turismo, este préstamo es su primera secuencia dentro de la institución, el Sr. Gonzalo va a usar este préstamo para compra de redes para usar en la pesca, su razón para solicitar este préstamo es aumentar la pesca e incrementar su capital  de trabajo, el Sr. Gonzalo enfrenta retos en su negocio que son tener una mejor producción y va a utilizar los beneficios en seguir mejorando en su trabajo ya que este es su único ingreso para mantener a su familia, el Sr. Gonzalo es una persona muy trabajadora se siente feliz por la oportunidad que le brindan.
texts.en:
Gonzalo, 37, is married and has five children, ages 16, 14, 12, and 10 who attend school.  He is a fisherman and lives on Lake Titicaca Island, a tourist center in the department of La Paz where the public can buy reed or wool crafts.  Most of the inhabitants of the island are involved in fishing or tourism.  This is his first loan through the institution and Gonzalo plans to use it to buy fishing nets.  He wants to increase his fishing activity and working capital.

Gonzalo must face challenges such as increasing production and using his profits to continue improving his work situation since this is the only source of income for his family.  Gonzalo is a very hard worker who is happy because of this opportunity.

loans.use: To buy fishing nets.

loans.name: Guillermina

texts.es: La Sra. Guillermina tiene 38 años ella se dedica al comercio de quinua, su tienda se encuentra en la localidad de Batallas de la ciudad de La Paz, este préstamo es su primera secuencia dentro de la institución, la Sra. Guillermina va a usar este préstamo de para compra quinua por mayor para abastecerse de este producto ya que es de mucha demanda de la población por su alto valor nutricional, su razón para solicitar este préstamo es incremento de capital de trabajo ya que esta época tiene mucha venta de este producto, además que es época de cosecha, la Sra. Guillermina enfrenta retos en su negocio que son la competencia, ella va a utilizar los beneficios es seguir incrementando su mercadería, la Sra. Guillermina es una persona muy trabajadora se siente feliz por la oportunidad que le brindan en la otorgación del crédito ya que ella está empezando en esta actividad y con el tiempo desea tener un acopio de este producto y también de trigo y otros cereales.
texts.en:
Guillermina is 38 years old and she sells quinoa.  Her store is located in the Batallas region in the city of La Paz.  This loan is her first from the institution.  Guillermina will use it to buy wholesale quinoa to stock up, since it is in demand due to its high nutritional value.  She is seeking this loan because she doesn't have the capital to invest and this is the time of year in which she sells a lot of quinoa.  This is also the harvest season of quinoa.
  
Guillermina faces many challenges in her business and has a lot of competition.  She is going to use this money to increase the stock of her merchandise.  Guillermina is a very hard-working person and she is thankful for the opportunity that this loan provides her.  In time, she hopes to have a large stock of this product and also to have wheat and other cereals.

loans.use: to buy wholesale quinoa.

loans.name: Miguel Angel

texts.es:
El señor  Miguel de 36 años de edad  es  casado y vive con su esposa en su casa de habitación donde se dedica a la  elaboración de lácteos y  rosquillas.
Don Miguel este producto lo vende en las diferentes aldeas vecinas en su casa de habitación, se dedica a su micro empresa desde hace 10 años, sus cliente son los vecinos de su aldea, pero la mayor parte de cliente son  de diferentes lugares aledaños.
Don Miguel cada día por las tardes sale en su vehículo a ofrecer su producto por las diferentes aldeas y caseríos está solicitando el préstamo para la compra de leche, azúcar, manteca, etc. para la elaboración de s lácteos como mantequilla, cuajada y quesillo y con las ganancias y el apoyo de este préstamo  desea salir adelante y seguir mejorando sus ingresos.
Don Miguel su sueño es crecer más en su micro empresa y generar fuente de trabajo.


San Lorenzo, Honduras - Junio2013
texts.en:
Miguel is 36 years old, married and lives with his wife.  At home, he makes a living making dairy products and pastries.

Miguel sells his products in the neighbouring villages.  He has had his little business for ten years, with customers including people from his own village, though most live in other, adjoining places.

Every afternoon, Miguel goes out in his vehicle to sell his products in the different villages and country houses.  He is applying for this loan in order to buy milk, sugar, animal fat and more in order to make dairy products such as milk, curd cheese and butter.  With his profits and the support of this loan, Miguel wants to get ahead and continue to increase his income.  Miguel's dream is to expand his business further and provide jobs for others

San Lorenzo, Honduras, June 2013

loans.use: to buy milk, sugar, animal fat and more for his business.

loans.name: Hilda Maribel

texts.es:
La señora  Hilda  de 41  años de edad, es soltera  y  vive con su hija de 15 años de edad, se dedica desde hace 10 años a la venta y elaboración de alfarería.
Doña Hilda  sus clientes son todas las personas que transitan  por la calle internacional hacia el salvador, también tiene clientes que le compran al  por mayor y  lo revenden en el interior del país.
Doña Hilda está muy contenta con el apoyo de los préstamos y este es su segundo crédito con Prisma.
Doña Hilda está solicitando el préstamo  para la compra  de arcilla,  pinceles, pintura, etc. que es la materia prima para la alfarería y con las ganancias y el apoyo de este préstamo  desea salir adelante y seguir mejorando sus ingresos.
Doña Hilda su sueño es que su hija se gradué en la universidad.

San Lorenzo, Honduras – Julio  2013
texts.en:
Ms. Hilda is 41 years old, single, and lives with her 15-year-old daughter. For the past ten years, she has dedicated her time to the creation and sale of pottery. Her clients are all of the people that pass through the street Calle Internacional to El Salvador. She also has clients who buy her products in bulk and resell them in the interior of the country.

Ms. Hilda is very content with the support of the loans, as this is her second loan with Prisma. She is applying for this loan in order to buy clay, paint brushes, paint, etc., which are the primary materials for making pottery. With the earnings she makes and the support of this loan, she hopes to maintain her family and continue increasing her profits.

Her dream is for her daughter to graduate from college.

San Lorenzo, Honduras – July 2013

loans.use: to buy clay, paint brushes, paint, etc. for her business.

loans.name: Norma

texts.es:
Norma tiene  28 años, es una madre soltera de una niño de 6 años con quien vive en su casa propia. Norma se dedica a la producción integral de cacao orgánico en la localidad de Ranramayo, gracias al fruto de su trabajo ha logrado salir adelante. Le agrada su trabajo ya que disfruta del tiempo que está en el campo, además de recibir muy buenos ingresos económicos por sus frutos.
Como parte del inició correspondiente a la campaña de cacao proyectada para el próximo año desea contar con abono orgánico para obtener mejores frutos de cacao. Este es su segundo préstamo con Kiva y se siente agradecida por el apoyo financiero que recibe para seguir adelante, además se compromete a pagar sus cuotas de manera puntual. En está ocasión desea contar con 4,000 nuevos soles para la compra de abono orgánico.
texts.en:
Norma is 28 years old and is a single mother with a 6-year-old child with whom she lives in her own house. She works in the integral production of organic cacao in the town of Ranramayo. Thanks to the fruits of her labor, she has been able to maintain her family. Her work pleases her since she enjoys the time that she is in the countryside, in addition to receiving very good income for her work.

 As part of the corresponding beginning of the cacao campaign projected for the next year, she would like to be able to have organic fertilizer in order to obtain better cacao fruit. This is her second Kiva loan and she feels grateful for the financial support that she receives in order to maintain her family. In addition, she is committed to making her payments on time. This time, she would like to have 4,000 nuevos soles ($1,450) to buy organic fertilizer.

loans.use: to buy organic fertilizer.

loans.name: 22-Amanecer De Villa Tunari Group

texts.es: El Banco de emprendimiento 22-AMANECER DE VILLA TUNARI está  compuesto por ocho integrantes, seis  mujeres y dos varones,  la presidenta del banco es la Sra.  Judith Vanesa tiene 24 años, tiene un hijo de las edad de  3 años,  ella se dedica a la confección de ropa deportiva, ella se dedica a esta actividad hace ya 3 años, su taller se encuentran ubicado en la zona Villa Ingenio de la ciudad de El Alto, este préstamo es su segunda secuencia dentro de la institución, la Sra.  Judith Vanesa utilizara este préstamo para compra de maquina recta y over para la confección de sus prendas de vestir, su razón para solicitar este préstamo es falta de capital de trabajo, la Sra.  Judith Vanesa enfrenta retos en su negocio que son seguir mejorando la calidad de la confección de las prendas de vestir y  va a utilizar los beneficios en seguir aumentando  su  capital de trabajo su deseo para su negocio es crecer y confeccionar variedad de prendas de vestir la Sra.  Judith Vanesa se siente feliz y agradecida con la institución por el apoyo brindado.
texts.en:
The group 22-AMANECER DE VILLA TUNARI is comprised of 8 members, six of whom are women and two are men.  The president of this group is Judith Vanesa.  She is 24 years old and has a 3 year-old son.  She makes sportswear and she has done this work for 3 years.  Her workshop is located in the Villa Ingenia region of the city of El Alto.  This is her second loan with the institution.  

Judith Vanesa will use this loan so that she can buy a sewing machine to make sportswear.  She is seeking a loan because she doesn't have the money needed to buy one.  Judith Vanesa is continually improving the quality of her clothing and sportswear and she will use her earnings to further invest in her work.  She wants to grow her business and to create a larger variety of clothing.  Judith Vanesa is happy and thankful for the support she is receiving from the institution.

loans.use: to buy a sewing machine.

loans.name: Melvin

texts.es: Melvin, está en unión libre, tiene la edad de 47 años y vive con su esposa y hijos que son su mayor prioridad. El con el crédito va compra la semilla y los abonos para la asistencia de la siembra de cubases. El cuenta con un terreno apto para la explotación de este cultivo por lo cual 	quiere volver a invertir en este proyecto para trabajar. El se ha dedicado desde varios años a esto y ve necesario la asistencia de la plantación, con el fin de obtener más ganancias para su bienestar y futuro de su familia. Es el primer  préstamo que  recibido de FUDECOSUR. El no había tenido antes otros préstamos en bancos estatales, pero FUDECOSUR le ha brindado el préstamo con mayores facilidades y la tasa de intereses mucho más baja.
texts.en: Melvin is 47 years old and has a partner.  He lives with his wife and children, who are his biggest priority.  Melvin will use this loan in order to buy seeds and manure in order to help grow his cuba plants.  Melvin has a plot of land set up for this kind of crop and wants to invest in this project again, in order to work.  Melvin has been doing this for some years and sees a need for helping the crops.  This will allow him to earn a higher income, to support his family's well-being and future.  This is Melvin's first loan from "Fudecosur".  He has had no other loans from state banks but "Fudecosur" has given him this loan with better conditions and a much lower interest rate.

loans.use: to help grow cuba (a type of plant).

loans.name: Alexander

texts.es: Alexander, está casado, tiene la edad de 40 años y vive con su esposa y hijos que son su mayor prioridad. El con el crédito va comprar los insumos para la asistencia de café como los abonos y los plaguicidas necesarios. El actualmente cuenta con la plantación en un estado regular por lo cual opto por el crédito para poder mejorar y aumentar cosecha este año. El espera de su plantación obtener el máximo de ganancias para un mejor bienestar y salir adelante con sus proyectos de vida. Es el primer  préstamo que  recibido de FUDECOSUR. El no había tenido antes otros préstamos en bancos estatales, pero FUDECOSUR le ha brindado el préstamo con mayores facilidades y la tasa de intereses mucho más baja.
texts.en:
Alexander is married, he is 40 years old, and he lives with his wife and children.  His family is his top priority.  

With this loan, he will buy supplies so that he can maintain his coffee crop.  He will buy fertilizers and the necessary pesticides so that he can improve and grow his harvest this year.  He hopes that his crops will bring in the maximum income possible, so that things will be better and he can get ahead. 
 
This is the first loan that he has received from FUDECOSUR.  He has not had loans in the past from the state banks, but FUDECOSUR has given him the opportunity to obtain a loan easier and with lower interest.

loans.use: to maintain his coffee crop.

loans.name: Andres Luis

texts.es: El Sr. Andrés sigue con la misma actividad del servicio de amplificación, cuenta que le fue bien con el anterior crédito ya que lo utilizo en la compra de dos equipos de amplificación, en esta ocasión solicita el crédito para la compra de amplificadores y así mejorar la potencia de sonido para su amplificación, ya que tiene muchos contratos para aminar distintas actividades sociales , se siente feliz y agradecido por la oportunidad que le brindan ya que está creciendo y mejorando su actividad.
texts.en: Andrés continues with his work hiring out sound systems.  He tells us that his previous loan went well as he used it to buy two sound systems.  On this occasion he is applying for a loan to buy amplifiers and thus improve the power of his equipment.  He has many contracts to provide sound services for different social occasions. Andrés is happy and grateful for this opportunity.  His business is growing and he is improving his service.

loans.use: to buy amplifiers.

loans.name: Cherie Key

texts.en:
Cherie Key works hard to support her family. She is married and has a fish vending business in the Philippines. She has been in this business for 5 years now.

Cherie Key requested a 10,000 PHP loan through Negros Women for Tomorrow Foundation, Inc. to buy more fish to sell.

Cherie Key would like to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to buy more fish to sell

loans.name: Rowena

texts.en:
Rowena is 38 years old and married with five children.

Rowena works hard to provide for her family. She runs a general store in the Philippines and requested an 11,000 PHP loan through NWTF to buy additional items to sell like soap, milk, noodles, canned goods, etc. Rowena has borrowed and paid 3 loans from NWTF before this loan. She has been running the general store for 2 years and also earns an income from buy and sell dried fish.

Rowena aspires to save enough money so she could send her children to school.

loans.use: to buy additional items to sell like soap, milk, noodles, canned goods, etc.

loans.name: Jean Caryl

texts.en:
As a married parent of one child, Jean Caryl works hard to support her family. She has a general store business in the Philippines, and also earns additional income from buying and selling livestock.
